item.description:
Bom dia pessoal!

Temos um outro festival, este e de Jazz e o grupo do Bloco AfroBrazil do Marcus Santos vai estar esta la para esquentar a festa. Eles vao esta apresentando das 1-3 pm mas festival e a tardo toda. O evento sera na Columbus Ave. entre a Massachusetts Ave e a Burke St. Vamos nos encotrar la.

Hello!

Let's meet once again at the Beantown Jazz festival to check out Marcus Santos's Bloco AfroBrazil. The festival is from noon til 6 but they will be performing at the street level from 1-3 so lets meet at that time close to them. Since it will be hard to predict a good meeting point before going contact the people that have RSPV to exchange cell numbers or to get an ideal as to who should be there and feel free to contact me if you have any questions. The event will be at Columbus Ave between Mass. Ave. and Burke St.

For info on the players check out: www.afrobrazil.org.

Um grande abraco para todos,

Carolina

group.name: The Boston/Cambridge Portuguese Language Meetup Group

item.name: Beantown Jazz Festival
